name: Gleipnir
description: Bindings forged by impossible means to leash an ancient evil.

abilities.name: Eternal Chains
abilities.description: Launches shackles at enemies within the area, rooting them in place and revealing them.
notes: Launches projectiles onto enemies within the radius
Can target invisible units and units inside the Fog of War
Cannot target invulnerable or hidden units
Roots the targets, preventing them from moving and casting certain mobility abilities
Provides True Sight over affected targets
The True Sight pierces debuff immunity, the root does not
Blocked individually on impact by Spell Block
Reflected individually on impact by Spell Reflection
Shares cooldown with Rod of Atos

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
If a Rod of Atos was purchased as well, Gleipnir's icon takes priority
The item's attributes grant additional stats: 144 mana, 0.6 mana regeneration and 1.2% flat base magic resistance
12 main attack damage to Intelligence heroes
5.4 main attack damage to Universal heroes
